subject: TIVI-2144 : Fix Segfault during popup process creation

owner.name: Baptiste (DO NOT USE) DURAND (DO NOT USE)

commitMessage:
TIVI-2144 : Fix Segfault during popup process creation

Add pointer test to allow the function call _edje_part_recalc_single_textblock with null args

-> backport test pointer from current EFL version (1.8.4)

Change-Id: Ie7d183110075f6f32936cb66203e2a16976e9aca
Signed-off-by: Baptiste DURAND <baptiste.durand@open.eurogiciel.org>

reviewer.name: Baptiste (DO NOT USE) DURAND (DO NOT USE)

comments.message: Uploaded patch set 1.

Patch Set 1: Code-Review-1

Having NULL for the minw, minh, maxw or maxh parameters should never ever happen. It seems that the bug is somewhere else.

Also, please use proper EFL coding style, as described in

https://phab.enlightenment.org/w/ecoding/

reviewer.name: Baptiste (DO NOT USE) DURAND (DO NOT USE)

comments.message:
Patch Set 1:

Edouardo,
I know but as indicated to the commit message 
in src/lib/edje_calc.c:1349
there is :
 _edje_part_recalc_single_textblock(sc, ed, ep, chosen_desc, params,NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);

So the fix is needed.
Please review your note.

Patch Set 1: Verified+1 Code-Review+1

Looks good to me ; would be better to use spaces instead of tabs on line 1263, though.

reviewer.name: Baptiste (DO NOT USE) DURAND (DO NOT USE)

comments.message: Uploaded patch set 2.

reviewer.name: Baptiste (DO NOT USE) DURAND (DO NOT USE)

comments.message: Uploaded patch set 3.
Patch Set 3: Verified+1 Code-Review+1

Patch Set 3:

Oh, I am sorry, I didn't see that use there. By the way, which program is segfaulting? I am speaking with the upstream maintainer and he would like to understand more the problem

Patch Set 3:

Ok, talking to the upstream maintainer, he figured out what's going on and will submit the proper fix for this in a few minutes.

reviewer.name: Baptiste (DO NOT USE) DURAND (DO NOT USE)

comments.message:
Patch Set 3:

This is widget app
 https://bugs.tizen.org/jira/browse/TIVI-2144

The issue is related to Popup management .

Click on Test Ajax button the app should segfault without this fix.

reviewer.name: Baptiste (DO NOT USE) DURAND (DO NOT USE)
